sentences.english: Seeds are open - minded, drink a heaven-sent "holy water."
sentences.chinese: 种子们放开胸怀，畅饮着天赐的“圣水”。

sentences.english: The festival ends when the monks spray holy water on to the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 仪式以僧侣们向人群布施圣水为结束。

sentences.english: He took the cover off the font , and put his white gloves in it.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开圣水器的盖子，把自己的白手套放了进去。

sentences.english: We in today trip, the will to understand the three gorges water magic.
sentences.chinese: 我们在今天行程里，就会领会到三峡竹海圣水的神奇。

sentences.english: Water that has washed the lotus feet of the Nrsimha Salagrama-sila destroys the sin of theft.
sentences.chinese: 用来清洗圣石莲花足的圣水可以摧毁偷窃的罪恶。

sentences.english: Of pure oblution round earth's human shores.
sentences.chinese: 用圣水冲洗人间的岸滩。

sentences.english: Goku attempts to climb the massive Korin Tower in hopes of finding the Sacred Water.
sentences.chinese: 小悟空试图爬上高高的加林仙塔，希望能找到超圣水。

sentences.english: The pure Walden water is mingled with the sacred water of the Ganges.
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔登的纯粹的水已经和恒河的圣水混合了。

sentences.english: If you have the holy water vials, now is the time to use them.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有小瓶圣水，现在是时候使用它们。

sentences.english: In Italy an inventor devised an electronic holy water dispenser.
sentences.chinese: 在义大利，一名发明人士发明了一种自动圣水机。

sentences.english: She gives me over to Grandfather who removes the deerskin robe and sprinkles His "holy water" over me.
sentences.chinese: 她让我交给谁清除的祖父和鹿皮袍洒他的圣水超过我。

sentences.english: The priest sprinkled holy water on the baby's forehead.
sentences.chinese: 神父把圣水洒在婴儿的额头上。

sentences.english: Holy water , clove leaf , silver shavings , white oak . the works.
sentences.chinese: 有圣水，丁香叶，银屑，白橡木，这肯定有效。

sentences.english: Of pure ablution round earth's human shores.
sentences.chinese: 纯净的圣水洗礼著人居的岸沿。
